alias g="git"
alias b="build.py"
alias m="build.py -m"
alias j.root="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/"
alias j.build="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/build/"
alias j.dev="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/dev/"
alias j.bin="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/dev/bin/"
alias j.env="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/dev/env/"
alias j.sample="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/dev/sample/"
alias j.test="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/dev/test/"
alias j.inc="cd ${RAPID_IMAGE_ROOT}/inc/rapid-image"
